refnamediv.refpurpose: To know whether the iteration limit (node limit) was reached.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This post-solution query routine is used to learn whether the iteration limit(node limit) was reached.
It prints whether or not the iteration limit (node limit) was reached to scilab console.
It can also be used if "find first feasible" parameter was set to true before solving the problem.

refsection.title: Return value
refsection.para: It returns 1 if the iteration limit is reached or 0 if the iteration limit is not reached or -1 if there was an error.
